description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8di6l","text":"Single-cell metabolically labeled new RNA tagging sequencing (scNT-Seq) is a droplet microfluidics-based, time-resolved RNA-seq method for joint profiling of newly synthesized (“new”) and pre-existing (“old”) RNAs from the same cell by marking new transcripts with T-to-C substitutions via chemical conversion of 4-thiouridine (4sU) in new RNAs to cytidine analogs (Qiu et al., Nature Methods 17.10 (2020): 991-1001. PMID: 32868927). Here, we described the updated scNT-Seq2 method in which an optimized second-strand synthesis reaction is employed to increase the mapping rate and library complexity.  This step-by-step protocol describes metabolic labeling, sample preparation, and scNT-Seq2 library preparation for Illumina sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"1dpmj","text":"1. Hu, Peng, et al. \"Dissecting cell-type composition and activity-dependent transcriptional state in mammalian brains by massively parallel single-nucleus RNA-seq.\" Molecular cell 68.5 (2017): 1006-1015.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":166,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mrd1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sti","text":"2. Qiu, Qi, et al. \"Massively parallel and time-resolved RNA sequencing in single cells with scNT-seq.\" Nature methods 17.10 (2020): 991-1001.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":104,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9iir0","text":"Prepare a 1 M stock solution of 4-thiouridine (4sU) by dissolving the powder in DMSO.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3pde","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"diio2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8uvh0","text":"Note: the stock is stable for a few months at -20 C. Protect the solution from light.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"18nle","text":"After metabolic labeling, cells were rinsed once with DPBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ealqj","text":"For metabolic labeling, the medium was replaced with fresh medium supplemented with nontoxic concentrations of 4sU (i.e. 100 or 200 μM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bavv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"49u7f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7t3di","text":"If the labeling time is longer than 4 hours, regular exchange of fresh 4sU-containing","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"58mno","text":"media (i.e. every three hours) can enhance 4sU incorporation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d5r0i","text":"Add 0.5 mL Accutase to each well of the 6-well plate and incubate at 37 C for about 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d096m","text":"Dilute the cell with DPBS (containing 0.01% BSA + 0.5%RNase-Inhibitor) to 100 cells/ μL (1 X 105 cells/mL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":95,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bbr9u","text":"Count the cell number with Countess II.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fl8u5","text":"Resuspend the cell pellet with 1 mL of DPBS (containing 0.01% BSA + 0.5%RNase-Inhibitor).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3vpg8","text":"Add 1 mL culture medium to neutralize the Accutase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vvm8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4sftp","text":"Collect cell suspension in the 15 mL tube, spin down cells at 350 g, 3min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lhfg","text":"Prepare lysis buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jh4b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"744r1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9p8dl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","",null],"colWidths":["171",100,"144"],"data":[["Reagents","Vol.(μL)","Final Concentration"],["H2O","400",""],["20% Ficoll PM-400","300","6%"],["20% Sarkosyl","10","0.2%"],["0.5 M EDTA","40","20 mM"],["1.0 M Tris-HCl, pH 7.5","200","200 mM"],["1.0 M DTT (add freshly)","50","50 mM"]],"guid":"93C6E84E00324859A135EAC97F26C99D","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"du5sc","text":"Lysis buffer master mix","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagents","Vol.(μL)","Final Concentration"],["H2O","400",""],["20% Ficoll PM-400","300","6%"],["20% Sarkosyl","10","0.2%"],["0.5 M EDTA","40","20 mM"],["1.0 M Tris-HCl, pH 7.5","200","200 mM"],["1.0 M DTT (add freshly)","50","50 mM"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vgna","text":"Prepare barcoded beads:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5cil","text":"Wash beads once with 30 mL of 100% ethanol and twice with 30 mL of TE-TW (10 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 1 mM EDTA and 0.01% Tween-20). Pass the beads through a 100 μm cell strainer and count the number of beads. Resuspend the beads at 120 beads/μL concentration in 1.5 mL lysis buffer for each run (to profile 1,000~2,000 cells). Transfer 1.5 mL of bead suspension into a 3 mL Luer lock syringe. Make one more mL of lysis buffer to wash the syringe and magnetic disc.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52l3q","text":"Draw up 7 mL of droplet generation oil (Bio-Rad) into a 10-mL Luer-lock syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gfdi","text":"Connect 3 syringes (containing cells, beads, and oil, respectively) to the Aquapel-coated","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ag9n","text":"PDMS Microfluidic device (μFluidix) with the following flow rate setting:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hgd9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5nfu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bacbi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["123","149"],"data":[["Syringe Content","Flow Rate (μL/hr)"],["Oil","15000"],["Cells","4000"],["Beads","4000"]],"guid":"DFA231E1C53D4F69AC9DD837B09740FC","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Syringe Content","Flow Rate (μL/hr)"],["Oil","15000"],["Cells","4000"],["Beads","4000"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5n8f2","text":"Start the run in the following order: cells → beads → oil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fthfc","text":"When the flow of droplets stabilizes, collect ~20 μL of aqueous flow to examine the droplet quality. Check whether the droplet size is uniform and estimate the percentage of bead doublets (the doublet rate should be less than 5%).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"83tk","text":"Once confirming the droplet quality, collect 1.2-1.3 mL of droplets into a 50 mL conical tube (target 1,000~2,000 cells for each sample).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9397e","text":"Remove the oil layer from the bottom of the 50 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"33jj","text":"Add 30 mL of room temperature 6X SSC into the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1evjv","text":"Spin at 1,000x g for 1 min. Remove the supernatant. Wash beads once with 1 mL of 6X SSC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7s8su","text":"The beads are now pelleted to the bottom of the tube. Carefully remove all but ~1 mL of liquid. Resuspend the beads with the remaining liquid and transfer them to a 1.5 mL Low Binding tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"lm00","text":"Spin at 1,000x g for 1 min to pellet the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1lgfo","text":"Add 25 mL of 6X SSC to kick up the beads into thesolution again. Transfer and combine the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7cbrr","text":"Add 1 mL of Perfluorooctanol (PFO) into the tube in a fume hood. Shake by hand to break the droplets (3-4 forceful vertical shakes, the shakes should be long distance -- from head to leg) Spin at 1,000x g for 1 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ribi","text":"Carefully remove the supernatant on top and then add 25 mL of 6X SSC to kick up the beads into the solution. Wait a few seconds to allow the majority of the oil to sink to the bottom. Transfer the supernatant to a new 50 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5f21","text":"Wash beads once with 450 μL reaction buffer (without TFEA and NaIO4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":66,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6s382","text":"Incubate beads in 474 μL Reaction-mix + 26 μL NaIO4 at 45 C for 1 hr with rotation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":50,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b307","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctpgu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6kgh8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["209",100],"data":[["Reagents","Volume (μL)"],["3 M sodium acetate (pH 5.2)","8"],["0.5 M EDTA (pH 8.0)","2"],["H2O","214"],["TFEA","13"],["Sub-total","237"],["192 mM NaIO4","13"]],"guid":"9B356F5F58084FA5B06656E9C59480FF","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bc8st","text":"Master mix for chemical conversion","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagents","Volume (μL)"],["3 M sodium acetate (pH 5.2)","8"],["0.5 M EDTA (pH 8.0)","2"],["H2O","214"],["TFEA","13"],["Sub-total","237"],["192 mM NaIO4","13"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b05dj","text":"Wash the beads once with 0.7 mL TE buffer (10 mM Tris-HCl, 1 mM EDTA, pH 7.5).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6k3ql","text":"Incubate the beads in 0.7 mL Reducing Buffer at 37 C for 30 min with rotation. Add 2% RNase inhibitor (20 μL/1 mL) to the reducing buffer before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5513j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhu8b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9igna","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["161",100],"data":[["Reagents","For 1mL (μL)"],["1 M Tris-HCl (pH7.5)","10"],["1M DTT","10"],["5M NaCl","20"],["0.5M EDTA","2"],["RNase Inhibitor","20"],["DEPC-H2O","958"]],"guid":"3F68A336A50247898765C3DE85CC2D4A","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6q491","text":"Reducing Buffer","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagents","For 1mL (μL)"],["1 M Tris-HCl (pH7.5)","10"],["1M DTT","10"],["5M NaCl","20"],["0.5M EDTA","2"],["RNase Inhibitor","20"],["DEPC-H2O","958"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9e5k6","text":"Prepare RT mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9kov","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdrds","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2klcr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egbiq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["298",100],"data":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["H2O","80"],["Maxima 5X RT buffer","40"],["20% Ficoll PM-400","40"],["10 mM dNTPs","20"],["100 μM Template Switch Oligo","5"],["RNase Inhibitor","5"],["Maxima H Minus Reverse Transcriptase","10"]],"guid":"1E675FB525C94FCFBA7547105FAC7F6A","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["H2O","80"],["Maxima 5X RT buffer","40"],["20% Ficoll PM-400","40"],["10 mM dNTPs","20"],["100 μM Template Switch Oligo","5"],["RNase Inhibitor","5"],["Maxima H Minus Reverse Transcriptase","10"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"70c4m","text":"Add 220 μL of RT mix to the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9q5ke","text":"Incubate beads at room temperature for 30 min with rotation, then 120 min at 42 C with rotation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eggmq","text":"Wash beads once with 1 mL TE-SDS (10 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 1 mM EDTA, and 0.5% SDS), twice with 1 mL TE-TW, then store the beads at 4°C over-night (in TE-TW buffer). [This is a Stop point. Store at 4C overnight (in TE-Tw buffer).]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1aof","text":"Prepare Exonuclease mix (makes 200 μL):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atnrk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egl6q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"da5aj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["198",100],"data":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["10X Exonuclease I buffer","20"],["H2O","170"],["Exonuclease I","10"]],"guid":"4C568B1E5EA348CC934A070A10F49909","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["10X Exonuclease I buffer","20"],["H2O","170"],["Exonuclease I","10"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ctur","text":"Wash beads once with 1 mL 10mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, re-suspend in 190 μL of exonuclease mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4deht","text":"Incubate beads at 37 C for 45 min with rotation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fd5s8","text":"Wash beads once with 1 mL TE-SDS, and twice with 1 mL TE-TW. [This is a Stop point. Store at 4C overnight (in TE-Tw buffer).]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Run 1st round of TSO-PCR using 6,000-beads as templates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"71v10","text":"Wash beads once with 1 mL H2O. Spin at 1,000x g for 1 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":27,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Run 1st round of TSO-PCR using 6,000-beads as templates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"648v2","text":"Remove supernatant and re-suspend the beads with 1 mL of H2O. Quickly transfer 2 μL of beads into a well of a 96-well plate (containing 198 μL of H2O) and count the number of beads. Repeat bead counting three times and take the average.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Run 1st round of TSO-PCR using 6,000-beads as templates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"63lmc","text":"Transfer an aliquot of 6,000 beads (corresponding to ~100 cells) into a PCR tube. Spin down and remove the supernatant, then re-suspend the beads with 50 μL PCR mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4uj5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbe6q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"686lt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["201",100],"data":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["KAPA HiFi HS Readymix","25"],["100 μM TSO-PCR primer","0.4"],["H2O","24.6"]],"guid":"93F44DF4E1AF454CB0F08519DDE91B44","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"epcha","text":"TSO-PCR master mix","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["KAPA HiFi HS Readymix","25"],["100 μM TSO-PCR primer","0.4"],["H2O","24.6"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

steps.section: Run 1st round of TSO-PCR using 6,000-beads as templates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cvccn","text":"Run 1st round of TSO-PCR. PCR program: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2e93d","text":"Very important: run 1st round of TSO-PCR to determine the exact number of amplification cycles. Over-amplification of the cDNA library will lead to fewer detected nuclei in the end).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90vag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd6lh","text":"   95 C for 3 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bqs6","text":"4 cycles of:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2abeg","text":"   98 C for 20 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bahg5","text":"   65 C for 45 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4sdk5","text":"   72C for 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3golp","text":"9 cycles of:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dk2ub","text":"   98 C for 20 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rb61","text":"   67 C for 20 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10cg4","text":"   72 C for 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qjno","text":"Then:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdm9j","text":"   72 C for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fdnf6","text":"   4 C forever","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Run 1st round of TSO-PCR using 6,000-beads as templates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7m0o4","text":"Purify PCR products once with 0.7X (35 μL) SPRI beads once and elute in 15 μL Elution buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Run 1st round of TSO-PCR using 6,000-beads as templates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7al77","text":"Measure the concentration of PCR products by Qubit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Run 1st round of TSO-PCR using 6,000-beads as templates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2u2p8","text":"Perform real-time PCR to determine the additional number of PCR cycles needed for optimal cDNA amplification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97g4p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"auded","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a653l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["246",100],"data":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["Purified cDNA","1"],["25 μM TSO-PCR primer","0.2"],["2X KAPA FAST qPCR Readymix","5"],["H2O","3.8"]],"guid":"32A145BE195D42369BBE622065D3F175","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"labe","text":"Real-time PCR master mix","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["Purified cDNA","1"],["25 μM TSO-PCR primer","0.2"],["2X KAPA FAST qPCR Readymix","5"],["H2O","3.8"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

steps.section: Run 1st round of TSO-PCR using 6,000-beads as templates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7tj7i","text":"Run real-time PCR with the following program, and determine the optimal PCR cycle number","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6q0b8","text":"   95 C for 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au8do","text":"25 cycles of:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"493h","text":"   95 C for 15 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qhqv","text":"   63 C for 30 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qmsq","text":"   72 C for 30 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1inrp","text":"Combine the PCR product for a given sample into a 1.5 mL Low Binding tube and purify twice with SPRI-select beads (0.6X Volume for the 1st \u0026 0.7X Volume for the 2nd purification).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":85,"length":5},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":115,"length":62}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fn6mp","text":"Quantify the cDNA library by Qubit and run the bioanalyzer to check the average fragment size of the purified cDNA library (the expected average size of cDNA library is 800-1,500 bp).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"13bgs","text":"Preheat the thermocycler to 55 C. For each sample, take out 1 ng of purified cDNA with H2O in a total volume of 5 μL to a PCR tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":88,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cqr7l","text":"Add 10 μL of Nextra TD buffer and 5 μL of Amplicon Tagmentation enzyme to each reaction. Mix by pipetting ~5 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ml2b","text":"Incubate at 55 C for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"719oe","text":"Add 5 μL of Neutralization Buffer to each reaction. Mix by pipetting ~5 times. Spin down and incubate at room temperature for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45k5","text":"Add to each PCR tube in the following order:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emv93","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9lak","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5og6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["216",100],"data":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["Nextra PCR mix","15"],["2 μM P5-TSO hybrid primer","5"],["2 μM Nextera N70X oligo","5"]],"guid":"F39B81C101F4465A9478CE1813243021","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["Nextra PCR mix","15"],["2 μM P5-TSO hybrid primer","5"],["2 μM Nextera N70X oligo","5"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dqtt5","text":"PCR program:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cuu8d","text":"   95 C for 30 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43tdj","text":"12 cycles of:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bt70e","text":"   95 C for 10 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6c7pn","text":"   55 C for 30 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3cpdj","text":"   72 C for 30 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5bsvu","text":"Then:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9acrl","text":"   72 C for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bm1nm","text":"   4 C forever","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de1ml","text":"Purify PCR product twice with 0.6X SPRI beads. Elute the cDNA in 12 μL H2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":72,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5h15a","text":"Quantify the concentration of cDNA library by Qubit and check the average fragment size of the purified cDNA library by Bioanalyzer (the expected fragment size is 500-700 bp).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2r8p6","text":"Dilute the library to 2 nM and pool the libraries according to the estimated cell numbers (100 cells/6000 beads).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tt17","text":"After determining the optimal PCR cycle number (usually an additional 0-4 cycles), perform large-scale TSO-PCR with the remaining beads. Wash the remaining beads twice with 1 mL H2O. Apportion 6,000 beads for each PCR reaction. Spin down and remove the supernatant, then resuspend the beads with 50 μL PCR mix. PCR program:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":179,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"30ct","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4mnjk","text":"   95 C for 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1t9s6","text":"4 cycles of:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hb80","text":"   98 C for 20 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"faq7l","text":"   65 C for 45 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95ctk","text":"   72 C for 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cbln","text":"X plus additional cycles of:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"er1hp","text":"   98 C for 20 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tfju","text":"    67 C for 20 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4k16","text":"   72 C for 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjvuu","text":"Then:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vau","text":"   72 C for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t8ur","text":"   4 C forever","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f1odj","text":"Prepare second strand synthesis mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qkn5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6u39g","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"87ft3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","7_0":"","7_1":""},"colTitles":["A","B"],"colWidths":["322",100],"data":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["10X Isothermal Amplification Buffer II","10"],["20% Ficoll PM-400","20"],["10 mM dNTPs","14"],["Bst 3.0 DNA Polymerase (NEB)","5"],["TSO-N3G2N4B primer (100  μM)","10"],["MgSO4 (100 mM)","6"],["H2O","35"]],"guid":"3C7CE7293754452396263205A118BE96","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2gbvl","text":"Second strand synthesis master mix","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagents","Vol. (μL)"],["10X Isothermal Amplification Buffer II","10"],["20% Ficoll PM-400","20"],["10 mM dNTPs","14"],["Bst 3.0 DNA Polymerase (NEB)","5"],["TSO-N3G2N4B primer (100  μM)","10"],["MgSO4 (100 mM)","6"],["H2O","35"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6m0pb","text":"After aspiration of TE-TW buffer, resuspend beads in 500 μL 0.1 M NaOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fldq9","text":"Incubate beads at room temperature for 5 min with rotation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"apv1n","text":"Add 500 μL 0.2M Tris-HCl (pH 7.5) to neutralize the solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bfrq7","text":"Wash beads once with TE-TW and once with 10 mM Tris-HCl (pH 8.0).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3p68c","text":"Add 200 μL second strand synthesis mix to the beads. [Add Bst3 enzyme right before the reaction.]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b5enj","text":"Incubate beads at 15 min at 60 C with rotation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5dder","text":"Wash beads once with 1 mL TE-SDS, and twice with 1 mL TE-TW and twice with H2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dojnf","text":"Wash the beads once with 1 mL Tris-HCl buffer (10 mM, pH 7.5).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"10t69","text":"Wash the beads once with 0.3 mL 2X RT buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5185f","text":"Elute the cDNA with 40 μL Low-EDTA TE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
